imdb.plot outline: The thematic seasons of Teatro e Circunstância address the contemporary theater through different aspects, from the relationship of this art with the city to the interpretative techniques and staging styles, and through the many possibilities of theatrical architecture or its absolute absence and the use of any space for the dramatic celebration.
imdb.title: Teatro e Circunstância
plot: The thematic seasons of _Teatro e Circunstância_ (qv) address the contemporary theater through different aspects, from the relationship of this art with the city to the interpretative techniques and staging styles, and through the many possibilities of theatrical architecture or its absolute absence and the use of any space for the dramatic celebration.::Sebastião Milaré
